Intelligence is unaffected in most people with Freeman-Sheldon syndrome, but approximately one-third have some degree of intellectual disability.",GHR,Freeman-Sheldon syndrome
How many people are affected by Freeman-Sheldon syndrome ?,Freeman-Sheldon syndrome is a rare disorder; its exact prevalence is unknown.,GHR,Freeman-Sheldon syndrome
